name: @edufeed-org/oer-finder-api-client
description: Auto-generated API client for OER Aggregator
author: B310 Digital GmbH

scripts.generate: pnpm run generate:spec && pnpm run generate:types
scripts.build: pnpm run generate:types && vite build && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && pnpm run postbuild
scripts.build:full: pnpm run generate && vite build && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && pnpm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: cp dist/src/index.d.ts dist/index.d.ts && cp dist/src/index.d.ts.map dist/index.d.ts.map 2>/dev/null || true
